channel.title: FIXED: P16 Item.java and Player.java?
channel.description:
[s]P16 v.6 does not let me equip anything on the head slot for some reason, although the helmet and hat things are defined in the player.java and are in their appropriate spots in the item.java.
Why won't they equip in the helmet place? Everything else equips fine.[/s]
Sorry, I fixed it.
